settings.heading:
House of Spells is a Fandom themed shop that provides attraction through its design in the shops and sells licensed products such as Harry Potter, Game of Thrones, Lord of The Rings, Fantastic Beasts, The Hobbit, Vikings, and many other unbridged collections from Celtic and Gothic selections.

Just 2 minutes away from Leicester Square tube station, next to China Town on Shaftesbury avenue lies a shop shrouded in mystery. A unique experience for fans and visitors alike, the House of Spells was opened to the public on the 15th July 2019. The shop is open 7 days a week.

We house our wide range of licensed products across two floors. During your time at the House of Spells, you will find yourself among a bunch of passionate staff who are eager to help you with any questions about your visit.

We have portable ramp access from the front of the shop for those who would require it. Although the wheelchair access is to the ground floor only, we will be more than happy to provide you with our product catalog and serve you with any artifacts or gifts that you may be interested in.

We welcome you to the store and bear witness to the awe-enthusing interiors and fine treasures hidden within our walls. At the House of Spells there is a place for everyone, no matter your taste!

Find Us Here:

settings.heading: 1. WHICH COUNTRIES DO YOU SHIP TO?
settings.content: We ship our items internationally (Outside the UK) to all the countries.  However, some products such as food or drinks may not allowed to ship to your country. You will be unable to checkout if you order from one of those countries and your order contains any such products.

settings.heading: 2. HOW LONG DOES DELIVERY TAKE?
settings.content:
Orders typically ship within 1-3 business days of payment. (Weekends do not count as business days as we are closed during weekends). We do our best to ship as quickly as possible. This is reflected in the estimated delivery date you were originally given. We will update you with tracking information as soon as it ships.

You will have the options to choose from faster shipping methods if you prefer to, depending on the country and products you ordered.

settings.heading: 3. HOW MUCH IS THE SHIPPING?
settings.content:
We offer free standard delivery in the UK via Royal Mail along with paid faster delivery options.

Don't Live in the UK?

Depending on the weight and size of the product/order, country you are ordering from, we offer a number of shipping methods. You will be able to choose from available options at checkout.

settings.heading: 4. CAN I RETURN AN ITEM?
settings.content:
If you changed your mind or not happy with your order or you need to exchange the products, we will happily accept returns as long as a request to return is received by us within 30 days of receipt of item and are returned to us in the original packaging, unused, and in a resalable condition.you can contact us directly via email (info@houseofspells.co.uk) with your order number and issue.
Any Damaged item or missing item should be reported within 48 hours of delivery.
For more information about refunds and returns, please visit follow link:
https://houseofspells.co.uk/policies/refund-policy

settings.heading: 5. HOW TO REPORT IF SOMETHING IS WRONG WITH MY ORDER?
settings.content: If you find parcel is damaged in transit, if possible, please reject the parcel from the courier and get in touch with our customer service. If the parcel has been delivered without you being present, or something is not right, contact us within 48 hours of delivery at info@houseofspells.co.uk with images or videos showing the issue.

settings.heading: 6. WHEN A PRODUCT WILL BE BACK IN STOCK?
settings.content: We always try to keep our stock accurate and updated. If the product you are looking for is out of stock, you can sign up for the email notification to notify when back in stock, available on the product page.

settings.heading: 7. HOW TO USE MY GIFT CARD?
settings.content:
Gift cards purchased and Discount codes can be redeemed on the website at the time of checkout. Please enter the code as shown.
Please note, our gift cards are only redeemable on the website, not in store.

settings.heading: 8. HOW CAN I PAY WITH CLEARPAY?
settings.content:
Clearpay is a third-party payment provider that enables 4 interest-free payments paid fortnightly for items on the website.
You can choose Clearpay payment option at the checkout. you will be redirected to Clearpay page to make the transaction and will be redirected back to the website.

settings.heading: 9.DO YOU OFFER DISCOUNT CODES?
settings.content: We offer a number of discount codes to our valuable customers. You can get one when you subscribe to our newsletter and via emails on weekly basis.

settings.heading: 10. HOW CAN I EARN AND USE MAGIC POINTS?
settings.content:
You can earn rewards points (magic points) when you place an order with us and via a number of ways. If you login to our rewards program shown at the bottom left of the website, you can see your current points and ways to earn more points.
You can redeem your points from this panel. Choose how many points you want to redeem after clicking on ways to redeem points.
You will receive a code via email, simply enter the code at checkout.

settings.heading: 11.  HOW TO CHANGE CURRENCY?
settings.content:
If you wish to see the price of the products in your currency, you can choose from the pop up when you first visit the website. If you didn't choose that time you can always change by :

In Desktop/Laptop:
Click on the dropdown menu at the bottom of the website, shown in the middle of footer section and choose your currency.

In Your Phone:

Click on the small globe at the bottom left corner of the website and choose your preferred currency.

settings.heading: 12. CAN I APPLY FOR AFFILIATE PROGRAM?
settings.content:
If you are an influencer and wish to work with us, you can apply to be an affiliate via the following link:

https://houseofspells.goaffpro.com/

settings.content: I came here two days ago and it was amazing. They had quite the collection that every Harry potter fan would love. Staff was very attentive and patient to answer all my questions and helped me choose the perfect present for my friend. I'd totally recommend it.

A fantastic shop for people who love Harry Potter, Games of Throne and other Fantasy productions.. A very lovely place where you can feel the same atmosphere of these unique Universe and find a selection of real good memorabilia. Not to miss!

I’ve never seen such a magnificent world of wizardry until this one. The one stop destination for all of your gothic fantasies. Harry Potter, Game of Thrones, Vikings..The throne from the Game Of Thrones  was really amazing. I will visit again.
